body.p: Read about Gentoo Linux's presence at Linux World Expo on August 5-7 in this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. Also included are news about the first Gentoo BugDay, held on August 2, the removal of the WineX CVS ebuilds, a profile of long-time developer Seemant Kulleen, a tip about generating passwords and WEP keys, and an annoucement of Gentoo Linux's presence at Chaos Communication Camp 2003 from August 7-10 near Berlin. Enjoy!
